issues.title: `HierarchicalAllocatorProcess::removeSlave` doesn't properly handle framework allocations/resources
'containerizer->update' will always fail after killing a docker container.
CgroupsIsolatorTest.ROOT_CGROUPS_CFS_EnableCfs is flaky.
Oversubscription could crash the master due to CHECK failure in the allocator
Default executor doesn't wait for status updates to be ack'd before shutting down
Docker container's resources will be wrongly enlarged in cgroups after agent recovery
Hook manager implementation is missing mutex acquisition in several places.
Docker executor doesn't wait for status updates to be ack'd before shutting down.
Master CPU high due to unexpected foreachkey behaviour in Master::__reregisterSlave.
New CLI is not included in distribution tarball
agent should not send `TASK_GONE_BY_OPERATOR` if the framework is not partition aware.
WWWAuthenticate header parsing fails when commas are in (quoted) realm
'dist' and 'distcheck' cmake targets are implemented as shell scripts, so fail on Windows/MSVC.
Sorter may leak clients allocations.
Nvml isolator cannot be disabled which makes it impossible to exclude non-free code
HierarchicalAllocatorTest.MaintenanceInverseOffers is flaky
Command executor can miss exit status for short-lived commands due to double-reaping.
Very large quota values can crash master.
updateAllocation() can stall the allocator with a huge number of reservations on an agent.
Duplicate tasks if agent partitioned during maintenance down
Allocator method dispatches can be reordered (relative to scheduler API calls which triggered them).
Libprocess SSL verification can leak memory
Authorizing invalid operation can result in declined authorization.
Detecting whether executor is generated for command task should work when the launcher_dir changes
Mesos build on Windows appears to be broken.
Cannot pull image from docker registry which does not reply with 'scope'/'service' in WWW-Authenticate header
Master's agent draining VLOG prints incorrect task counts.
Reactivating a draining agent leaves the agent in draining state.
After HTTP framework disconnects, heartbeater idle-loops instead of being deleted.
Mesos agent fails to start on outdated systemd.
Recently introduced PathTest.Relative and PathTest.PathIteration fail on windows.
MasterAPITest.ReservationUpdate is flaky
MSVC build can segfault when composing authorization Action for updating reservation.
containeriser: failed to remove cgroup - EBUSY
After failover, master crashes on re-adding an agent with maintenance schedule set.
Libprocess ignores most protobuf (de)serialisation failure cases.
Failed check in libevent_ssl_socket.cpp: 'self->bev' Must be non NULL
OpenSSLSocketImpl with 'support_downgrade' waits for incoming bytes before accepting new connection.
OpenSSLSocketImpl with 'support_downgrade' can silently stop accepting sockets.
Attempt to reactivate disconnected agent crashes the master
Agent incorrectly handles draining when empty
Authorization for /logging/toggle and  /metrics/snapshot is skipped on Windows.
Windows overlapped IO discard handling can drop data.
OpenSSLSocketImpl on Windows with 'support_downgrade' is incorrectly polling for read readiness.
Web UI roles tree files are missing from automake install.
Performance regression in HierarchicalAllocations_BENCHMARK_Test.PersistentVolumes
